about_the_game:
About "1K - Small Room -"

This is a first-person horror adventure game set in a single apartment room.
Players take on the role of Daisuke, the protagonist, exploring a one-room apartment where his suddenly deceased uncle used to live.
By collecting the codes and documents left by his uncle, players will uncover the hidden truth.
Can you unveil the big secret in this small room? Or will you be consumed by the terror of the confined space?
Everything depends on your choices.

Story

A young man, Daisuke, stands in a dimly lit hallway. He is now on the fourth floor of the apartment building where his uncle used to live.
A week ago, sudden news of death struck Daisuke.
The death of his uncle, whom he had looked up to like a brother since childhood. Along with the news came a letter and a key.
The letter contained a wish for Daisuke to visit his uncle's room.
Daisuke knows that his uncle possessed a vast amount of cryptocurrency.
Under the pretext of sorting through the belongings, he might be able to trace the whereabouts of those assets in this place.

From the moment he steps off the elevator, there's a strange atmosphere permeating this floor.
The hallway lights are dim, occasionally flickering ominously. And then, faint sounds coming from nowhere.

Daisuke clutches the key in his pocket.
He feels his hand trembling slightly. His uncle's room should be at the end of the dimly lit hallway stretching before him.

The truth behind his uncle's death, and the whereabouts of the cryptocurrency. To unravel all the mysteries, Daisuke takes a deep breath and slowly steps forward.
